title: error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_traits/src/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:54:32: could not fully normalize

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code The code cannot easily be entirely summarised in a small segment. It involves a [criterion benchmark](https://github.com/bheisler/criterion.rs) on a library. Specifically running `cargo bench` in on this branch (https://github.com/JonathanWoollett-Light/static-la/tree/bench-error) triggers the error. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.58.0-nightly (82af160c2 2021-11-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: 82af160c2cb9c349a0373cba98d8ad7f911f0d34 commit-date: 2021-11-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_traits/src/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:54:32: could not fully normalize ` as static_la::Matmul>>::Output` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (82af160c2 2021-11-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions] normalizing ` as static_la::matmul::Matmul>>::Output` #1 [fn_abi_of_instance] computing call ABI of ` as static_la::matmul::Matmul>>::matmul` end of query stack warning: `static-la` (bench "benchmarks") generated 12 warnings error: could not compile `static-la`; 12 warnings emitted warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed jonathan@jonathan-MS-7B22:~/Projects/static-la$ ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_traits/src/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:54:32: could not fully normalize ` as static_la::Matmul>>::Output` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug 3: ::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: ::enter::::{closure#0}> 8: )>>::call_once 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::, rustc_middle::ty::subst::GenericArg>> 10: ::normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions 11: rustc_middle::ty::util::fold_list:: as rustc_middle::ty::fold::TypeFoldable>::super_fold_with::{closure#0}> 12: rustc_middle::ty::layout::fn_abi_of_instance 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::)>, core::result::Result<&rustc_target::abi::call::FnAbi<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS>, rustc_middle::ty::layout::FnAbiError>>> 14: ::fn_abi_of_instance 15: rustc_codegen_ssa::mir::codegen_mir:: 16: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 17: >::with_task::> 18: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 19: ::codegen_crate 20: ::time::, rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen::{closure#0}> 21: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 22: ::ongoing_codegen 23: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 24: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}> 25: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (82af160c2 2021-11-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions] normalizing ` as static_la::matmul::Matmul>>::Output` #1 [fn_abi_of_instance] computing call ABI of ` as static_la::matmul::Matmul>>::matmul` end of query stack warning: `static-la` (bench "benchmarks") generated 12 warnings error: could not compile `static-la`; 12 warnings emitted jonathan@jonathan-MS-7B22:~/Projects/static-la$ ```
